name: 28th International Conference on Dermatology & Skin Care
content: The “28th International Conference on Dermatology & Skin Care” will be held in Barcelona, Spain, April 3–4, 2023, and is proudly invited by DERMATOLOGY 2023\. "Scientific Approaches and Preventive Care for Skin, Hair in the Era of Clinical Dermatology" is the conference's theme. This prestigious 28th International Conference on Dermatology & Skin Care is all about talking about and exchanging information on topics like - Dermatological disease, Acne, Blisters, Common wart, Onychomycosis, Psoriasis, Dry skin, Rosacea, Skin cancer, Cosmetic/Aesthetic Dermatology, Bacterial Skin Infections, Fungal Skin Infections, pathology, Eczema and Dermatitis, Skin Grafting etc.
